name: Alchemist
effect: Can brew concoctions

name: Apprentice Mage
effect: Learn a basic secret of magic

name: More Apprenticeship
effect: Deepen knowledge and learn new secret.

name: Blade Magic
effect: Spend CAP to +2 a weapon

name: Blade Magic II
effect: Spend extra points, grant extra bonuses

name: Brutal Critical
effect: Extra 2 damage dice on a critical hit.

name: Cat's Grace
effect: +1 dex, ignore 20ft fall, adv on fall checks

name: Combat Healer
effect: Heal in combat. Wounds you attempt to heal gain a bonus to healing later

name: Companion
effect: Summon an animal companion

name: Concentration Focus
effect: Advantage on concertation checks

name: Daemon Specialist
effect: Adv on knowledge checks about daemons and deal +int damage to them

name: Expert Climber
effect: adv to not fall or catch falling person, +1 strength, climb twice as fast

name: Expert Liar
effect: creatures have disadv to know if you are lying, +1 charisma

name: Extra  Wound
effect: More Wounds

name: Hard to Kill
effect: Increase damage required to instantly die. Adv on saves to do with death.

name: Extra Attack
effect: Extra Attack

name: Extra Attack II
effect: Extra Attack

name: Extra Resilient
effect: Minor saves becomes a major save.

name: Finesse
effect: Use dexterity to hit with light melee weapons

name: Forceful Personality
effect: Add int or wisdom to persuasion or intimidation. +1 to int, wis, or cha

name: Glyph
effect: You learn a glyph

name: Hard Hearted
effect: Sanity reduction 2

name: Heartless
effect: No sanity damage when allies go down or when you kill innocents.

name: Improved Recovery
effect: Recovery Dice become d8s

name: In Touch with Nature
effect: Communicate and tame animals.

name: Inspiring Leadership
effect: You can inspire you allies.

name: Knowledgeable
effect: +2 knowledge skills, half level bonus to all knowledge skills

name: Mage Hunter
effect: Reaction attack against someone who casts a spell, adv to identify spells

name: Expert Mage Slayer
effect: 2d6 extra damage against spellcasters, ignore magical defences

name: Medium Armour
effect: Use medium armour, +1 strength

name: Heavy Armour
effect: +1 str, can use heavy armour

name: Monster Specialist
effect: Adv on knowledge checks about monsters and deal +int damage to them

name: Multi-Disciplined
effect: +1 to any stat, ignore class prerequisites for a feat.

name: Poisoner
effect: You learn how to use poisoners

name: Precise Strike
effect: Extra damage while using light weapons

name: Protector
effect: Shield your allies. +2 ac

name: Push On
effect: Bolster your allies with a 10 minute speech.

name: Quick Draw
effect: You can draw as many weapons as you have attacks per round

name: Rapid Reload
effect: You can make up to 2 attacks with weapons with the loading property

name: Rapid Response
effect: Adv on initiative, full defence if surprised.

name: Reliable Medic
effect: Creatures you try to heal are more likely to survive their wounds

name: Resilient
effect: Last untrained save becomes a minor save

name: The Most Resilient
effect: All saves are major saves, +2 to all saves

name: Runner
effect: +1 dex, you run 4x your movement speed when you run

name: Sane
effect: You get an extra 2 sanity per level

name: Second Wind
effect: While in combat you can heal 1d8+con defence on your turn.

name: Sharpshooter
effect: Double your range with ranged weapons

name: Accurate Shot
effect: +5 to hit, half damage

name: Cover Expert
effect: Take one attack when you take cover. +1 ac while in cover

name: Deadly Shot
effect: -3 to hit, extra 2d8 damage

name: Silent Invocation
effect: You can cast invocations without speaking

name: Skilled
effect: Two more skills

name: SMASH
effect: Adv on str checks, can't roll below a 5 when smashing things

name: Speedy
effect: Increase move speed by 10ft

name: Tough
effect: +4 defence

name: Undead Specialist
effect: Adv on knowledge checks about undead and deal +int damage to them

name: Vicious
effect: No sanity damage from killing people. Regain 1 sanity whenever you kill an innocent person

name: Wardancer
effect: Dance in battle, regain defence, avoid attacks of opportunity

name: Weapon Master
effect: +2 to hit with chosen weapon

name: Dagger Expert
effect: Extra attack with daggers, adv against a target you hit with the dagger

name: Bow Expert
effect: Extra attack while using bows

name: Charger
effect: Adv while charging

name: Bull Rush
effect: Knock people over when charging

name: Chosen Weapon
effect: Add full level when using chosen weapons

name: Cleave
effect: You can cleave through enemies for extra attacks

name: Improved Cleave
effect: you can cleave an extra time

name: Crippling Wound
effect: Reduce your enemies speed when you wound them

name: Defender
effect: +3 defence, hit people who hit your friends

name: Firearm Expert
effect: +2 to hit with firearms, critical hits with firearms deal extra damage

name: Harry the Wounded
effect: You deal an extra 2d10 damage to wounded creatures

name: Improved Rage
effect: You can rage an extra time, you deal extra damage while raging

name: Monkey Grip
effect: You can use two handed melee weapons in one hand

name: Mounted Expert
effect: You can attack twice while charging on a horse.

name: Mounted Charger
effect: You can move further when charging on a horse. You deal extra damage when you charge while on a horse.

name: Rage
effect: Rage to deal 2 extra damage, ignore a wound and gain DR 2

name: Sniper
effect: Stay still to gain +5 to hit on ranged attacks

name: Spear Master
effect: You can hit people as they enter your reach and can still use reach weapons when enemies are near

name: Stunning Blow
effect: You can stun those you hit

name: Take the Hit
effect: You can ignore a hit every short rest.

name: Two Weapon Fighter
effect: You can add your ability score modifier to weapons in your off hand, +2 ac while dual wielding

name: Two Weapon Extra Attack
effect: You can make an extra attack when you attack with your main hand.

name: Two Weapon Beast
effect: You can dual wield any melee weapons

name: Two Weapon Master
effect: You can dual wield any non-heavy weapons

name: Uncanny Reflexes
effect: You can add either intelligence or wisdom to your armour class while not wearing armour

name: Aura
effect: You can make an aura to give allies +2 to saves

name: Aura of Courage
effect: Your aura protects against  mental effects and fear

name: Aura of Protection
effect: Your aura grants damage resistance

name: Improved Aura
effect: Your aura grants a +1 ac bonus and covers a wider area

name: Divine Faith
effect: Adv on will saves, cure with a touch

name: Divine Secrets
effect: You learn magical secrets

name: Secrets of the Gods
effect: You focus on one secret, making it cheaper to cast

name: Faith Healer
effect: You can call upon your god to heal

name: Flaming Weapons
effect: Your weapons can burn with fire

name: Martial Clergy
effect: You can add half your level (min 1) to weapon attack rolls

name: Smite
effect: You can spend wisdom to deal extra damage

name: Saint
effect: You learn a powerful ceremony

name: Assassin
effect: Double damage on the first round of combat.

name: Bleeding Strike
effect: Your attacks leave your enemies bleeding

name: Careful Shooter
effect: Reroll misfire dice

name: Deadly Critical
effect: Critical hits ignore defence

name: Expert Stealth
effect: Rogue stealth bonus increase

name: Expert Trapmaster
effect: Rogue trapmaster bonus increase

name: Improved Precise Strike
effect: More precise strike damage

name: Jack of all Trades
effect: Bonus to all untrained skill checks

name: Roguish Speed
effect: +10 move speed

name: Skill Focus
effect: Level bonus to one skill

name: Stealth
effect: Ignore half defence while hidden

name: Arcane Recovery
effect: You can recover intelligence during a fight

name: Arcane Ward
effect: You can defend yourself with magic, gaining 10 defence.

name: Blood Magic
effect: You learn blood magic. You can injure yourself to make spells cheaper.

name: Advanced Blood Magic
effect: You can make spells even cheaper by taking more damage.

name: Daemon Blood Tattoo
effect: You can make tattoos from the blood of powerful creatures or daemons

name: Devastating Magic
effect: You deal more damage when using offensive magic.

name: Eldritch Secrets
effect: You learn forbidden secrets

name: Elemental Focus
prerequisite: Mage, Must be taken at level 1
effect: You can cast with strength or dexterity. You only start with one secret. +2 defence.

name: Empowered Casting
effect: Two of your secrets become deadlier.

name: Prepared Caster
prerequisite: Mage, Must be taken at level 1
effect: You learn more secrets but must prepare your invocations before you can cast them.

name: Primal Magic
prerequisite: Mage, Must me taken at level 1
effect: Your spells are more powerful but have a chance to go haywire

name: Secret Mastery
prerequisite: Mage, Must have mastered one secret
effect: All invocations in a secret you have mastered are reduced by 2

name: Secret of Summoning
prerequisite: Mage, Level 5, One secret deepened twice
effect: You learn to summon magical creatures based on your secrets

name: Witchery
effect: You focus on witchery, learning the secret of witchery and gain a pool of points to spend on spells

name: Create Trinket
effect: You learn to make minor magic items.

name: Hex
effect: You can hex your enemies

name: Witches? March
effect: You make a spell cheaper but gain a mark of evil.

name: Dwarven Armour Training
effect: +2 DR while using heavy armour and a shield

name: Dwarven Runic Armour
effect: You can put your runes on shields or amour.

name: Runic Magic
effect: You learn some runes and can put them on weapons

name: Elvish Archery
effect: +4 to hit with bows, can't use guns

name: Elvish Magic
effect: Spend wisdom to increase power of spells

name: Halfling Charm
effect: adv on charisma checks with other species, can surprise them more easily

name: Halfling Resilience
effect: + level bonus to will saves, +1 wisdom
